interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Town & Anchor - Natural Activated Charcoal Detoxifying Facial Cleanser
Review Date: 2015/10/12
Store: Town & Anchor
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Town & Anchor', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 4.6 x 4.4 inches; 11.2 Ounces'}
Review Text: I have been using this for a short time now. I have seen diminished fine line and large pores, my skin feels clean but not stripped or dry, and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. I received this as a TEST in exchange for an honest review. I thought because of this I would see no results, I was pleasantly surprised. It goes on easy/ smooth, is easy to use and has a light pleasant scent. I have been adding it to my daily skincare regimen.
Review Title: AWESOMENESS!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
HANA Organic Skincare - Organic/Vegan Lavender Grains Facial Cleanser + Exfoliator
HANA Organic Skincare
{'Brand': 'HANA Organic Skincare', 'Item Form': 'Grain', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic, Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '632709431672'}
Very gentle but effective! I love beauty products that are natural and non- irritating (a must for sensitive skin!). This mixes into the paste well and doesn't clump. Also, it rinses well and leaves no residue on the skin. However, my only wish is it came in other scents. While I like lavender, and lavender as an ingredient, its not one of my favorite scents. Overall though this works really well (especially on combination skin).
Very gentle, works good!
Worker B - Organic Dawn Facial Serum (Morning Serum)
Worker B
{'Package Dimensions': '5 x 1.5 x 1.4 inches; 4.64 Ounces'}
I'm reviewing both the Night and Day Serums as they seem to work best in conjunction ( Obviously). I have been using these (Day and Night Serum) for a short time now. While I haven’t seen a difference in deep wrinkles I have seen a diminished fine lines, puffiness, and dull skin. I received them as a sample in exchange for an honest review. I thought because of this I would see no results, I was pleasantly surprised. It goes on easy/ smooth and has a light pleasant scent. It absorbs fast and doesn't leave a residue.I have been adding them to my daily skincare regimen I will continue to use it and see if it helps with the wrinkles. Lastly, I love natural ingredients!
Good stuff!
Town & Anchor - Natural Activated Charcoal Detoxifying Facial Cleanser

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Care Preference:** The user remains dedicated to gentle, effective products tailored for sensitive skin and has recently expanded their routine to include a new cleanser that has positively impacted the appearance of fine lines and pores. Their interest in serums that promote skin health and address specific concerns like puffiness continues to grow.
- **Product Type:** They enjoy a diverse array of facial products, particularly those that are easy to apply and quickly absorbed without leaving any residue. The user recently added a new cleanser, which has become a staple in their daily regimen.
- **Ingredient Focus:** Committed to organic, vegan formulations, the user reflects a strong preference for ethical and sustainable beauty solutions, appreciating the benefits of natural ingredients.
- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** They enjoy a light, pleasant scent in their skincare products and are open to exploring additional fragrance options for sensory variety, indicating an appreciation for enjoyable sensory experiences in their routine.
- **Skin Type Concern:** Their focus remains on products suitable for acne-prone and combination skin, with an emphasis on maintaining skin health while addressing aging concerns such as fine lines and dullness.

Overall, the user prioritizes holistic beauty solutions that cater to skin sensitivity, embrace natural ingredients, and deliver effectiveness, while eagerly incorporating new products that align with their evolving skincare goals.
